DOC.brief_summary: This project add evaluation/research component exist peer outreach program , implemented 1100 soldier Michigan Army National Guard . The study aim : 1 ) evaluate implementation B2B program inform ongoing program modification facilitate future dissemination effort , 2 ) ass whether B2B program increase mental health substance use treatment initiation treatment retention among return National Guard soldier , 3 ) explore whether B2B program improve mental health symptom , decease hazardous alcohol use , improve soldier well-being .
DOC.brief_title: Linking National Guard Veterans With Need Mental Health Care
DOC.detailed_description: The study aim : 1 ) evaluate implementation B2B program inform ongoing program modification facilitate future dissemination effort , 2 ) ass whether B2B program increase mental health substance use treatment initiation treatment retention among return National Guard soldier , 3 ) explore whether B2B program improve mental health symptom , decease hazardous alcohol use , improve soldier well-being . The study three component address three specific aim . The first component assess B2B implementation use embed mixed method design . This evaluation include real-time assessment adaptation program , well retrospective evaluation implementation process , sustainability , potential spread . The second component address impact B2B treatment initiation retention . Preliminary analysis complete use regression analysis . Pending additional data DoD , interrupt time series design assess Michigan National Guard soldier ' VA non-VA service use multiple time period date B2B implementation conducted.. The third study component assess impact B2B MI ARNG soldier ' outcome use longitudinal survey data adjust baseline mental health status use data Post Deployment Health Assessment ( PDHA ) .
DOC.criteria: Michigan Army National Guard soldier return OEF/OIF deployment August 2010 December 2012 . Soldiers return deployment study time period .
